dcterms:description: This dataset contains reflectometry curves (XRR and NR) along with their corresponding fits, specifically designed for machine learning applications.

dcterms:description: This dataset includes controlled thin film growth data achieved through machine-learning based closed-loop feedback, utilizing online X-ray scattering analysis.
dcterms:title: Controlled thin film growth through machine-learning based closed-loop feedback with online X-ray scattering analysis
